description:
He was short on money and this job he found as a part-time camera assistant had a pretty solid wage. While he was waiting for the recruiter he ran into a classmate of his that basically everyone in the school had a crush on. The cutest girl in school!
She was here for the job also?! Maybe this is his chance to get closer to her...
But wait... this is an ADULT camera job?!
Source: hanime.tv

titles.title: Part-Time Job with a Girl I`m Interested In
気になるあの娘とアルバイト
